tooltip.public: Exclusive content for subscribers. To use, sign in with an ArcGIS Online subscription.

tooltip.org: Exclusive content for subscribers. Consumes credits.
tooltip.public: Exclusive content for subscribers that consumes credits. To use, sign in with an ArcGIS Online subscription.

Collaboration.title: Distributed collaboration
Collaboration.tooltip: This item was received from a distributed collaboration

tooltip.cityEngine: CityEngine Web Viewer and CityEngine Web Scenes are no longer supported.
tooltip.storyMap: The Classic Esri Story Map used to create this application has been retired in ArcGIS Enterprise. To create new stories, please use ArcGIS Storymaps.
tooltip.app: The Configurable Apps template used to create this application has been retired in ArcGIS Enterprise. To create a new application, please use ArcGIS Instant Apps, ArcGIS Storymaps, ArcGIS Dashboards, or ArcGIS Experience Builder.
tooltip.bdfs: Big Data File Shares are retired in ArcGIS Enterprise. This item is non-operational and can be deleted.

tooltip.online: A registered OAuth 2.0 application. May use premium or subscriber content.

Registered API Key Credentials (Personal.title: API key credentials - Personal
Registered API Key Credentials (Personal.tooltip: Grants personal privileges. For security purposes, you should guard these credentials as you would guard your username and password.

Registered OAuth 2.0 Credentials (Person.title: OAuth 2.0 Credentials - Personal
Registered OAuth 2.0 Credentials (Person.tooltip: Grants personal privileges. For security purposes, you should guard these credentials as you would guard your username and password.

Personal credential.title: Personal
Personal credential.tooltip: You are granting a personal privilege to this credential. For security purposes, you should guard any access token created with these credentials as you would guard your username and password. Please review the terms of use.
